text.__SUMMARY__: Cycas segmentifida is a species of cycad endemic to southern China. It is found in primarily western Guangxi, as well as parts of neighboring southern Guizhou and eastern Yunnan.
text.Range:
In China, Cycas segmentifida is recorded in:
Guizhou province: Ceheng County, Guiyang, Wangmo County, and Xingyi
Guangxi province: Nanning and Xilin County
Yunnan province: Funing County
Guangdong province: Guangzhou and Shenzhen cities (introduced)It is also cultivated in Shenzhen Fairy Lake Botanical Garden, South China Botanical Garden, Guizhou Botanical Garden, and the Forestry Academy of Guangxi.
